participant_1.name: Taylor
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, Taylor loves to express her feelings through music. She's friendly but can be a bit reserved until you get to know her.
participant_1.background: i grew up in the industry. my favorite band is rascal flats. i'm a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and down-to-earth, Jordan enjoys getting his hands dirty and finds joy in simple things like gardening. He has a quirky sense of humor but struggles with anxiety due to past experiences.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
